title: OT98: Vauban Thread
summary:
Key ideas:
- This is an open thread for people to post about anything they want.
- The author highlights a comment of the week about how companies are dealing with the new tax bill.
- The author also mentions a book and an update from an advertiser.
- The Future of Humanity Institute is conducting experiments.

Key learnings:
- The open thread allows for discussions on various topics.
- Some companies might be struggling with the new tax bill, and there are still attempts to evade taxes.
- The book and advertiser updates provide additional information and announcements for readers.
- The Future of Humanity Institute is seeking participants for their experiments.

Key questions:
- None mentioned.
